pages.text: These can be found all over the overworld and will carry many different kinds of goodies including: $(l:kingdomkeys:customize/magic_and_spells)$(item)Spells$(), $(l:kingdomkeys:customize/drive)$(item)Form orbs$(), $(l:kingdomkeys:synthesize/materials)$(item)Synthesis Materials$() and $(l:kingdomkeys:synthesize/munny)$(item)Munny$(). They however are the only kind of Blox that cannot be crafted, but you should break these whenever you see them.$(p)Note:$(br)Often they will be accompanied by $(l:kingdomkeys:blox/blast)$(item)Blast Blox$() or $(l:kingdomkeys:blox/danger)$(itemDanger Blox$(). To avoid losing any valuable loot, it's recommended to dig around the Prize Blox' first.
